Name: Dark Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: The fine, sweet and sour balance of a great Daiquiri with hints of molasses.
Nutrition: One serving of Dark Daiquiri contains 224 calories
